name: Federal Ministry of Health
description: The Federal Ministry of Health is responsible for national health policy, coordination of health services across states, and implementation of federal health programs.

name: Lagos State Ministry of Health
description: Lagos State Ministry of Health oversees health services delivery across Lagos State, implementing state-level health programs and coordinating with local government areas.

name: Kano State Ministry of Health
description: Kano State Ministry of Health manages health services across Kano State, focusing on primary healthcare, disease prevention, and health system strengthening.

name: Ikeja Local Government Area Primary Healthcare
description: Ikeja LGA Primary Healthcare Centre provides primary healthcare services to residents of Ikeja Local Government Area, including immunization, maternal health, and community outreach programs.

name: Dala Local Government Area Health Department
description: Dala LGA Health Department delivers primary healthcare services to Dala LGA residents, with focus on maternal and child health, immunization, and community health programs.

name: HealthForAll Foundation
description: HealthForAll Foundation is a national NGO focused on improving healthcare access in underserved communities through health education, capacity building, and direct service delivery.

name: HealthForAll Foundation - Kano Regional Office
description: The Kano Regional Office coordinates HealthForAll Foundation programs across Northern Nigeria, focusing on maternal and child health, malaria prevention, and community health worker training.

name: HealthForAll Foundation - Lagos Regional Office
description: The Lagos Regional Office manages HealthForAll Foundation programs in South-West Nigeria, focusing on urban health, adolescent health, and health system strengthening.

name: Community Action for Health - Rivers State
description: Community Action for Health is a grassroots civil society organization in Rivers State that advocates for improved healthcare services and conducts community-based health awareness campaigns.

name: Youth Health Advocates - Abuja
description: A youth-led civil society organization in Abuja focusing on adolescent and youth health advocacy, peer education, and community mobilization for health rights.

name: Global Health Initiative
description: Global Health Initiative is an international health organization working across multiple regions to improve health outcomes, strengthen health systems, and respond to global health challenges.

name: Global Health Initiative - Africa Regional Office
description: The Africa Regional Office coordinates GHI programs across Sub-Saharan Africa, focusing on infectious disease control, maternal and child health, and health system strengthening.

name: GHI - Nigeria Country Office
description: GHI Nigeria Country Office implements programs across Nigeria, working with federal and state health ministries, NGOs, and communities to improve health outcomes.

name: GHI - Kenya Country Office
description: GHI Kenya Country Office manages health programs in Kenya, focusing on maternal health, immunization, and health system strengthening in partnership with the Ministry of Health.

name: GHI - Ghana Country Office
description: GHI Ghana Country Office implements health programs across Ghana, with focus on malaria prevention, nutrition, and community health worker training.

name: Global Health Initiative - Asia Regional Office
description: The Asia Regional Office manages GHI programs across South and Southeast Asia, addressing health challenges specific to the region including nutrition, immunization, and health equity.

name: GHI - India Country Office
description: GHI India Country Office implements large-scale health programs across multiple states in India, focusing on maternal and child health, immunization, and health system strengthening.

name: GHI - Bangladesh Country Office
description: GHI Bangladesh Country Office manages health programs focusing on nutrition, maternal health, and infectious disease control in partnership with the government and local NGOs.

name: UK National Health Coordination Office
description: The UK National Health Coordination Office oversees health policy coordination, public health initiatives, and cross-sector health partnerships at the national level in the United Kingdom.

name: UK Health Services - North West England
description: North West England Health Services coordinates health service delivery across Greater Manchester, Lancashire, and Merseyside, implementing regional health strategies and programs.

name: UK Health Services - London and South East
description: London and South East Health Services manages health programs across London, Kent, Surrey, and Sussex, focusing on urban health challenges and health inequalities.

name: Kenya Ministry of Health
description: The Kenya Ministry of Health is responsible for national health policy, health service delivery coordination, and implementation of health programs across all counties in Kenya.

name: Kenya MOH - Nairobi County
description: Nairobi County Health Department implements health programs across Nairobi County, focusing on urban health, disease prevention, and health service delivery in informal settlements.

name: Kenya MOH - Kisumu County
description: Kisumu County Health Department manages health services across Kisumu County, with focus on maternal and child health, HIV/AIDS prevention, and community health programs.

name: Independent Health Research Institute
description: An independent research institute conducting health research and policy analysis, not affiliated with any parent organization. Represents a standalone organization edge case.

name: Community Health Volunteers Network
description: A network of community health volunteers operating independently across multiple states, representing a grassroots movement without formal organizational hierarchy.
